评论详情: I love this dress. It hugs all the right places, and is comfortable. I feel sexy and beautiful when wearing it.
This dress was perfect for my vampire outfit! I am larger chested (36H) and it fit beautifully.
Absolutely gorgeous. Wish there were smaller sizes available

I love this dress! Bought for a costume hut now I wear it just as an outfit sometimes. It is a good feeling material. Velvet-like. Flattering cut. Makes my midsection look smaller than it is. Big fan!

评论概述: Super cute and true to size!
评论详情: Bought for a concert. Fit great.  For reference- I'm 5'1 and 120 pounds and bought a small.  Plenty long to cover everything and still the perfect length.  Love it!
It is a costume for my daughter for Halloween. She thought the product was excellent and fit perfectly. Excellent choice on my daughter’s part.
Very soft . True to size. Good for small breast
maybe consider a size up if your blessed in the cakes dept & maybe the titties too actually.
Looked really good on my girl for prom and was a great price. 10/10

I'd say the dress is true to size and has some stretch, could even size down. It feels soft from the inside out. I was worried it might look costume-y with an itchy linning but it felt like a good quality dress with some weight to it. 10/10
